body.name: Homeika 28Kpa Cordless Vacuum, 380W Motor, 8-in-1 Lightweight Stick Vac with 50 Min Battery for Carpet & Pet Hair
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 33 mins
features: 🎄[380W Strong Brushless Motor]: The cordless stick vacuum equipped with a 380W strong brushless motor, provides 28,000Pa upgraded suction power. Makes it easy for you to capture all the dust, pet hair, debris in your home.

🎄[Suitable For Various Floors]: Suitable for hard floor, low-pile carpets, tiles and other floors. Multiple accessories can be assembled into 8 different combinations to meet all your cleaning needs. Dust cup (1.2L)/hepa/filter is detachable and washable.

🎄[Flexible LED Motorized Brush]: The 180° swivel brush and 4 LED lights enables you to easily clean the blind corners under furniture. The brush is not easy to wrap, ideal for full house cleaning, suitable for everyday use around children and pets.

🎄[Better Cleaning Results]: The vacuum cleaner cordless can capture 99.99 % of fine particles to 0.1um, and provide strong centrifugal force to effectively separate dirt. Note: Regularly clean the filter to prevent the vacuum cleaner from weakening and blocking.

🕒[Up To 50 Mins Of Runtime]: A detachable high-performance batteries can provide up to 50 minutes of uninterrupted operation time (Max mode 20mins, Mid mode 30mins, Min mode 50mins), homeika battery vacuum cleaner contains 6-CELL batteries.
✨[Purchase with Confidence] Homeika offer 7*24hrs customer service and life-time 100% satisfactory after-sales service for the cordless stick vacuum cleaner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I saw this on social media and immediately had to have it mostly because of the low price. I ordered it from Amazon in case I needed to return it so the return process would be easier. Needless to say I do not see myself returning this vacume as it is even better than my dyson cordless vacum. The suction is great, it is light weight and easy to use. It has a great turn radius and fits under/ between all of my furniture without having to rearrange my living room to vacuum. Perfect for carpets and hardwood. The cordless aspect makes it easy to clean the car and hard-to-reach spots by switching it to hand-held mode. And it is slim and easy to store! Best Vacuum ever!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Homeika cordless Vacuum
reviews.reviewText: This Homeika Cordless vacuum is perfect for me. The Vacuum is lightweight and moves around my hardwood floors smoothly and effortlessly. I like how is was able to vacuum my whole house and the battery lasted. Long life on the battery. This vacuum is lightweight which is perfect for me to hold.I have alot of hardwood floors and this vacuum does a great job keeping them clean and dust-free. The price is super affordable and I am thinking of getting another one for the upstairs as well. Super simple to empty the debris, just one simple clasp that is easy to snap and unsnap. Great value and a great buy. I would recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: To be honest I did not know what to expect with the vacuum but it's awesome. It's lightweight, portable, quiet and packs a punch. Suction is solid. Pause.If you're on the fence, definitely purchase it. Well worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the ULTIMATE Dyson dupe. I HIGHLY recommend. All the other vacuums like this on the market only work on wood flooring, resulting in needing a separate vacuum for carpet. Upon receiving the vacuum, the assembly was easy and I started using it right away. It works WONDERS, it gets in all the tight corners in my home and goes over the carpet seamlessly. It is also super lightweight and small enough to tuck away in a closet. The battery power lasts at least a couple days (it has yet to die on me yet). If you are looking for the perfect vacuum that doesn't break the bank, this is the one!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s best for vey lower pile carpet and hardwood flooring
reviews.reviewText: I use this cute vacuum for my, one bedroom apartment .FYI( I have only low pile carpet in my bedroom and walk-in closet areas.) The rest of my apartment is hardwood floor and bathroom is tile flooring . Also I have a kitten that sheds fur. This is amazing and it gets the job done ✅ and it completely cordless so you and bring it any where you need for quick convenient clean . The suction is decent. I would recommend for any person that needs something quick , convenient and cleans easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this vacuum!
reviews.reviewText: I actually look forward to coming home from work and cleaning. This vacuum is so light weight and simple to use it makes it quick task.The attachments are perfect for stairs and baseboards. I look forward to using it in the car.It’s powerful and the light shows exactly what you are picking up. It is easy to move to different floors and clean stairs on the way. Game changer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Convenient and Cost Effective
reviews.reviewText: This vacuum is pretty good for the price. It does great on floors and low carpet/rugs. It has pretty good suction power, but I'd go over the area more than once. Overall I like it. It gets the Job done. It's lightweight. It comes with two attachments and a wall mount which I like. The batter drains faster when you increase suction, but you still get some good cleaning time out of it. The battery isn't as bad as the one on my shark. Does it compare to a Dyson or a Shark, not really. Is it a good vacuum overall yes. Do I recommend buying, yes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Recently purchased this because our wireless Dyson vacuum was having issues and did not want to spend a lot on a vacuum at the moment. This one works so well especially for the price point! It has a long batter life, very strong suction and I love the light on the front of it. It also has a kit to mount it to the wall for easy storage and charging. Would definitely recommend!
La uso para aspirar toda la casa y la batería dura sin problema. Perfecta para piso y alfombras. Es ligera y de muy fácil movimiento. La súper recomiendo :)
